00053 void testWithSentence(Analyzer* analyzer)
00054 {
00055     cout << "########## test method runWithSentence()" << endl;
00056     
00057     Sentence s;
00058     string line;
00059     cout << "please input sentence ended with newline:" << endl;
00060     while(getline(cin, line))
00061     {
00062         s.setString(line.c_str());
00063 
00064         int result = analyzer->runWithSentence(s);
00065         if(result != 1)
00066         {
00067             cerr << "fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00068             exit(1);
00069         }
00070 
00071         // get n-best results
00072         if(s.getListSize() == 0)
00073         {
00074             cout << "no n-best result exists." << endl;
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078             cout << "n-best result:" << endl;
00079             for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i)
00080             {
00081                 cout << "\t" << i << ": ";
00082                 for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00083                 {
00084                     cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "(" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << "," << s.getReadForm(i, j) << "," << s.getNormForm(i, j) << ")/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00085                 }
00086                 cout << "\t" << s.getScore(i) << "\t#words: " << s.getCount(i) << endl;
00087             }
00088             cout << endl;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // get one-best result
00092         int i= s.getOneBestIndex();
00093         if(i == -1)
00094         {
00095             cout << "no one-best result exists." << endl;
00096         }
00097         else
00098         {
00099             cout << "one-best result:" << endl;
00100             cout << "\t" << i << ": ";
00101             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00102             {
00103                 cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "(" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << "," << s.getReadForm(i, j) << "," << s.getNormForm(i, j) << ")/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00104             }
00105             cout << "\t" << s.getScore(i) << endl;
00106         }
00107 
00108         cout << endl << "please input sentence ended with newline:" << endl;
00109     }
00110 }

00115 void testWithString(Analyzer* analyzer)
00116 {
00117     cout << "########## test method runWithString()" << endl;
00118     cout << "please input string ended with newline:" << endl;
00119 
00120     string line;
00121     while(getline(cin, line))
00122     {
00123         line += "\nbbb";
00124         cout << endl << "result:" << endl << analyzer->runWithString(line.c_str()) << endl;
00125         cout << endl << "please input string ended with newline:" << endl;
00126     }
00127 }

00132 void testWithStream(Analyzer* analyzer, const char* source, const char* dest)
00133 {
00134     cout << "########## test method runWithStream()" << endl;
00135 
00136     int result = analyzer->runWithStream(source, dest);
00137     if(result == 1)
00138     {
00139         cout << "succeed in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00140     }
00141     else
00142     {
00143         cerr << "fail in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00144         exit(1);
00145     }
00146 }

00151 void printUsage()
00152 {
00153     cerr << "Usages:\t" << OPTIONS[0] << " N-best [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00154     cerr << "  or:\t" << OPTIONS[1] << " [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00155     cerr << "  or:\t" << OPTIONS[2] << " INPUT OUTPUT [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00156 }
00157 
00161 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00162 {
00163     if(argc < 2)
00164     {
00165         printUsage();
00166         exit(1);
00167     }
00168 
00169     unsigned int optionIndex = 0;
00170     unsigned int optionSize = sizeof(OPTIONS) / sizeof(OPTIONS[0]);
00171     for(; optionIndex<optionSize; ++optionIndex)
00172     {
00173         if(! strcmp(argv[1], OPTIONS[optionIndex]))
00174             break;
00175     }
00176 
00177     // check argument
00178     if((optionIndex == optionSize)
00179         || (optionIndex == 0 && argc < 3) // command option "--sentence N-best"
00180         || (optionIndex == 2 && argc < 4)) // command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00181     {
00182         printUsage();
00183         exit(1);
00184     }
00185 
00186     // time evaluation for command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00187     clock_t stime = 0;
00188     if(optionIndex == 2)
00189     {
00190         stime = clock();
00191     }
00192     
00193     // create instances
00194     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00195     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00196     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00197 
00198     // set default dictionary file
00199     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00200 
00201     switch(optionIndex)
00202     {
00203     case 0:
00204         // set the number of N-best results,
00205         // if this function is not called, one-best analysis is performed defaultly on Analyzer::runWithSentence().
00206         analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, atoi(argv[2]));
00207 
00208         // command option: "--sentence N-best --dict DICT_PATH"
00209         if(argc == 5 && ! strcmp(argv[3], OPTION_DICT))
00210         {
00211             sysdict = argv[4];
00212         }
00213         break;
00214 
00215     case 1:
00216         // command option: "--string --dict DICT_PATH"
00217         if(argc == 4 && ! strcmp(argv[2], OPTION_DICT))
00218         {
00219             sysdict = argv[3];
00220         }
00221         break;
00222 
00223     case 2:
00224         // command option: "--stream INPUT OUTPUT --dict DICT_PATH"
00225         if(argc == 6 && ! strcmp(argv[4], OPTION_DICT))
00226         {
00227             sysdict = argv[5];
00228         }
00229         break;
00230 
00231     default:
00232         printUsage();
00233         exit(1);
00234     }
00235 
00236     // load dictioanry files
00237     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00238     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00239 
00240     //const char* userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT;
00241     //knowledge->addUserDict(userdict, Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8);
00242     //cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00243 
00244     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00245     {
00246         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00247         exit(1);
00248     }
00249     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00250 
00251     // set knowledge
00252     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00253     {
00254         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00255         exit(1);
00256     }
00257 
00258     // no POS output
00259     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00260 
00261     // output POS in alphabet format
00262     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00263 
00264     // output POS in Japanese format of full category
00265     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY, 1);
00266 
00267     // disable compound words combination
00268     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_COMPOUND_MORPHOLOGY, 0);
00269 
00270     // decompose user defined compound into nouns
00271     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN, 1);
00272 
00273     switch(optionIndex)
00274     {
00275     case 0:
00276         testWithSentence(analyzer);
00277         break;
00278 
00279     case 1:
00280         testWithString(analyzer);
00281         break;
00282 
00283     case 2:
00284     {
00285         clock_t etime = clock();
00286         double dif = (double)(etime - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00287         cout << "knowledge loading time: " << dif << endl;
00288 
00289 #ifdef IS_PAUSE
00290         char ch;
00291         cout << "before analyze..." << endl;
00292         cin >> ch;
00293 #endif
00294 
00295         testWithStream(analyzer, argv[2], argv[3]);
00296 
00297         dif = (double)(clock() - etime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00298         cout << "stream analysis time: " << dif << endl;
00299 
00300         dif = (double)(clock() - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00301         cout << "total time: " << dif << endl;
00302         break;
00303     }
00304 
00305     default:
00306         printUsage();
00307         exit(1);
00308     }
00309 
00310 #ifdef IS_PAUSE
00311     char ch;
00312     cout << "before destroy..." << endl;
00313     cin >> ch;
00314 #endif
00315 
00316     // destroy instances
00317     delete knowledge;
00318     delete analyzer;
00319 
00320 #ifdef IS_PAUSE
00321     cout << "after destroy..." << endl;
00322     cin >> ch;
00323 #endif
00324 
00325     return 0;
